unnormalised: ᱤᱧ ᱵᱟᱰᱟᱭ ᱥᱟᱹᱱᱟᱹᱧ ᱠᱟᱱᱟ ᱚᱠᱟ ᱡᱟᱭᱜᱟ ᱨᱮ ᱥᱮᱱᱴᱨᱟᱞ ᱵᱚᱨᱰ ᱚᱯᱷ ᱥᱮᱠᱮᱱᱰᱟᱨᱤ ᱮᱰᱩᱠᱮᱥᱚᱱ (CBSE) ᱴᱷᱮᱱ ᱠᱤᱪᱷᱩ ᱰᱚᱠᱩᱢᱮᱱᱴᱥ ᱠᱩᱧ ᱵᱷᱮᱡᱟᱭᱟ? ᱚᱠᱚᱭ ᱴᱷᱮᱱ ᱦᱚᱸ ᱮᱰᱨᱮᱥ ᱢᱮᱱᱟᱜᱼᱟ ᱥᱮ?
normalised:
C-B-S-E ᱴᱷᱮᱱ ᱠᱤᱪᱷᱤ ᱰᱚᱠᱩᱢᱮᱱᱴ ᱵᱷᱮᱡᱟ ᱞᱟᱹᱜᱤᱫ ᱚᱠᱟ ᱴᱷᱤᱠᱟᱹᱱᱟ ᱦᱩᱭᱩᱜᱼᱟ ᱚᱱᱟ ᱤᱧ ᱯᱟᱸᱡᱟᱭᱮᱫᱟ᱾
ᱚᱠᱚᱭ ᱴᱷᱮᱱ ᱴᱷᱤᱠᱟᱹᱱᱟ ᱢᱮᱱᱟᱜᱼᱟ ᱥᱮ?
text:
CBSE ᱴᱷᱮᱱ ᱠᱤᱪᱷᱩ ᱠᱟᱜᱚᱡᱽ ᱠᱩᱞ ᱞᱟᱹᱜᱤᱫ ᱚᱠᱟᱨᱮ ᱠᱩᱞ ᱫᱚᱨᱠᱟᱨ, ᱚᱱᱟ ᱜᱤᱧ ᱯᱟᱸᱡᱟᱭᱮᱫᱟᱹᱧ᱾
ᱡᱟᱦᱟᱭ ᱴᱷᱮᱱ ᱮᱰᱨᱮᱥ ᱢᱮᱱᱟᱜ-ᱟ ᱥᱮ?

unnormalised:
Central Board of Secondary Education (CBSE) ᱥᱟᱶ ᱥᱚᱨᱠᱟᱨᱤ ᱪᱤᱴᱷᱤᱯᱟᱛᱨ ᱞᱟᱹᱜᱤᱫ, ᱥᱟᱢᱟᱱᱭᱚᱛᱚ ᱩᱱᱠᱩᱣᱟᱜ ᱢᱩᱬ ᱯᱨᱚᱥᱟᱥᱚᱱᱤᱠ ᱚᱯᱷᱤᱥ ᱨᱮᱱᱟᱜ ᱴᱷᱤᱠᱟᱹᱱᱟ ᱵᱮᱵᱷᱟᱨ ᱜᱮ ᱵᱷᱟᱹᱜᱤᱭᱟ᱾
ᱤᱧᱟᱜ ᱢᱩᱪᱟᱹᱫ ᱟᱯᱰᱮᱴ ᱞᱮᱠᱟᱛᱮ, ᱢᱩᱬ ᱚᱯᱷᱤᱥ ᱫᱚ ᱱᱚᱣᱟ ᱴᱷᱤᱠᱟᱹᱱᱟ ᱨᱮ ᱢᱮᱱᱟᱜᱼᱟ: CBSE, Shiksha Kendra, 2, Community Centre, Preet Vihar, Delhi-110092.
ᱱᱚᱣᱟ ᱴᱷᱤᱠᱟᱹᱱᱟ ᱫᱚ ᱥᱟᱢᱟᱱᱭᱚ ᱠᱩᱠᱞᱤᱼᱠᱩᱠᱞᱤ, ᱠᱟᱜᱚᱡᱽ ᱡᱚᱢᱟ ᱟᱨ ᱮᱴᱟᱜ ᱫᱤᱱᱚᱢ ᱪᱤᱴᱷᱤᱯᱟᱛᱨ ᱞᱟᱹᱜᱤᱫ ᱵᱮᱵᱷᱟᱨᱚᱜᱼᱟ᱾
normalised:
C-B-S-E tho sorkari chithi-potro lagit, sadharontah onko-a muthan pradhan prashasnik karyalaya-a thikana lagao bes dhoron kana.
Inj-a akhiri jankari lekate, mukhiya karyalaya do ena-akhan:
C-B-S-E, Shiksha Kendra, Bar, Community Centre, Preet Vihar, Delhi-mit lakh dos hajar banowe.
Noa thikana do sadharontah sadharon kuli-kutam, dastabej joma, ar itar sadharon sanjog lagit bhabhao-a.
text:
(CBSE) logon sorkari chitthi-potra bhejaw lagit do, unak main prashasonik office thikana lagao do jham-jhahte bhabte geye barhao mena.
Inak mutthi update hisabte, main office do noa thikana re mena khan: CBSE, Shiksha Kendra, 2, Community Centre, Preet Vihar, Delhi-110092.
Noa thikana do jham-jhahte bhabte sadharan katha ko kulhi, kagoj-potra jama, ar jethen sadharan katha-batra lagit lagaoa.

unnormalised:
Menkhan, khas chetrak ar zona lagit CBSE renho regional office menak tinaha.
Jemon, jodi am Chennai re menama khan, am do apnar chitthipatra do CBSE Regional Office, Chennai then kulay daraya, ona do menaka: CBSE Regional Office, New No. 3, J Block, 16th Main Road, Anna Nagar West, Chennai – 600040.
Onka ge, Ajmer, Allahabad ar Guwahati lekan auri disom ren ho apanar regional office menaka; am do apnar zona lagit CBSE website khon sahi thikana do khojme.
normalised: Ente, bishesh elaka ar zone-ko lagit, C-B-S-E do regional office-ko hohõ menaka-a. Udaharon lekate, jodi aben Chennai re menak taben khan, aben do abenag chithi bhejau lagit C-B-S-E Regional Office, Chennai thikana te kul-ben, jea do menaka: C-B-S-E Regional Office, Nawa Number tin, J Block, 16th Main Road, Anna Nagar Pachim, Chennai – 600040. Ona lekage, Ajmer, Allahabad ar Guwahati lekage ajgar elaka kodo nitij-ko-a regional office-ko menaka; nischit-ben je abenag zone lagit thik thikana C-B-S-E website khon sapab.
text:
Menkhan, khas chetrak ar zona lagit CBSE renho regional office menak tinaha.
Jemon, jodi am Chennai re menama khan, am do apnar chitthipatra do CBSE Regional Office, Chennai then kulay daraya, ona do menaka: CBSE Regional Office, New No. 3, J Block, 16th Main Road, Anna Nagar West, Chennai – 600040.
Onka ge, Ajmer, Allahabad ar Guwahati lekan auri disom ren ho apanar regional office menaka; am do apnar zona lagit CBSE website khon sahi thikana do khojme.

unnormalised:
Mone doho tabon pe je address ko badol dareya', onate marang kagoj patra bhejawa' lebu'k' re CBSE-ren sorkari website (cbse.nic.in) re sobse notun pate jaanch tola' do uttam abhyas kana.
Website-ren "Contact Us" (jogajog tabon pe) kinba "Regional Offices" (ilaka office) bhag re ape jaruri pate ko nambak' dareya'.
Aar, dak' number ho nischit tabon pe, entek' bang sahiyog dak' number ko bhejawa' re bilom doho dareya'.
normalised:
Mone dohoime je thikana kope badlao dareyak'a, onate jaha'n marang kagaj kul aing khon pahile official C-B-S-E website (c b s e dot n i c dot in)-re sabse nutan thikana janch do sabge bhage kamma kana.
Aap' do aamtaur-te ohoko juri thikana website-ren "Contact Us" ok'a "Regional Offices" bhag-re nam dareyak'a.
Seta lagit', postal code ho paka-paki dohoime, chunka'n bhul postal code do delivery-re der' hoel dareyak'a.
text:
Mone doho tabon pe je address ko badol dareya', onate marang kagoj patra bhejawa' lebu'k' re CBSE-ren sorkari website (cbse.nic.in) re sobse notun pate jaanch tola' do uttam abhyas kana.
Website-ren "Contact Us" (jogajog tabon pe) kinba "Regional Offices" (ilaka office) bhag re ape jaruri pate ko nambak' dareya'.
Aar, dak' number ho nischit tabon pe, entek' bang sahiyog dak' number ko bhejawa' re bilom doho dareya'.
